caption.p: A list of chemical compounds isolated from the selected plants of the Leea genus with their short descriptions.

tr.td: Steroids
The presence of steroids was confirmed from ethanolic extract of Leea indica leaves
Steroids
Steroids were identified from hexane, chloroform, ethyl acetate, butanol and aqueous fraction of ethanolic extract of Leea macrophylla root tubers
Stigmasterol (1)
Stigmasterol was isolated from ethanolic extract of Leea macrophylla roots

Oleanolic acid (2), Ursolic acid (3), Maslinic acid (4), Chebuloside ii (5), Corosolic acid (6), Hederagenin-3-O-arabinopyranoside (7), Oleanolic acid 3-O- glucopyranosyl-(1→2) - arabinopyranoside (8)
Triterpenoids were identified from methanolic extract of aerial parts of Leea asiatica
Triterpenes
These triterpenes were isolated from methanolic extract of Leea asiatica
Oleanolic acid (2) & derivatives
These compounds were identified from ethanolic extract of Leea macrophylla roots
Terpenoids
These terpenoids were identified from ethanolic extract of Leea indica leaves
Quercitrin (9), (+)-Catechin (10), (−) - Epicatechin (11), (−)-Epiafzelechin (12), Juglanin (13), Mearnsetin 3-O-rhamnopyranoside (14), Myricitrin (15), Afzelin (16)
These flavonoids were identified from methanolic extract of aerial parts of Leea asiatica
Flavonoids
These flavonoids were identified from methanolic extract of Leea asiatica
Flavonoids
The presence of flavonoids was confirmed from ethanolic extract of Leea indica leaves
Flavonoids
Flavonoids were identified from hexane, acetone, methanol and ethanolic extract of Leea guineensis leaves
Quercitrin (9), Quercetin (17), Quercetin-3′-sulphate-3-O- α -L-rhamnopyranoside (18), Quercetin-3,3′-disulphate (19), Quercetin-3,3′,4′-trisulphate (20)
These flavonoids were isolated from leaves of Leea guineense
Flavonoids
The presence of flavonoids was confirmed from chloroform, ethyl acetate, butanol and aqueous fraction of ethanolic extract of Leea macrophylla root tubers
Glycosides
These glycosides were identified from methanolic extract of Leea asiatica
Astragalin (21), Isorhamnetin 3-O-β-D-glucopyranoside (22), Isoquercitrin (23), Mauritianin (24)
These flavonoid glycosides were isolated from the ethanolic extract of the of Leea aequata
Glycosides
The presence of glycosides was identified from ethanolic extract of Leea indica leaves
Glycosides
The presence of Glycosides was confirmed from ethyl acetate, butanol and aqueous fraction of ethanolic extract of Leea macrophylla root tubers
Glycosides
Glycosides were identified from ethyl acetate and methanol extract of Leea macrophylla seeds
Mollic acid α-L-arabinoside (25), Mollic acid β-D-xyloside (26)
These glycosidic compounds were isolated from ethyl acetate fraction of Leea indica leaves
Cardiac glycosides
These cardiac glycosides were identified from hexane, acetone, methanol and ethanolic extract of Leea guineensis leaves
Cardiac glycosides
These cardiac glycosides were identified from ethanolic extract of Leea indica leaves
4-hydroxyphenol-[6- O-(4″-hydroxy-3″,5″-dimethoxy-benzoate)]-β-D-glucopyranoside (27), Breynioside A (28)
These phenolic glucosides were identified from methanolic extract of aerial parts of Leea asiatica
9′-O-acetylisolariciresinol (29), (+)-Lariciresinol (30), (+)-Syringaresinol (31), Urolignoside (32)
These five lignans were isolated from the ethanolic extract of the aerial parts of Leea aequata
Gallic acid (33), Ethyl gallate (34)
These phenolic compounds were isolated from leaves of Leea guineense
Phenolics
These phenolic compounds were identified from butanol and aqueous fraction of ethanolic extract of Leea macrophylla root tubers
Phenolics
These phenolic compounds were identified from ethyl acetate and methanol extract of Leea macrophylla seeds
Tannins
The presence of tannins were confirmed from ethanolic extract of Leea indica leaves
Tannins
Tannins were identified from hexane, chloroform, methanol and ethanolic extract of Leea guineensis leaves
Tannins
Tannins were reported in the butanol and aqueous fraction of ethanolic extract of Leea macrophylla root tubers
Alkaloids
The presence of alkaloids was confirmed from aqueous extract of Leea guineensis leaves
Alkaloids
The presence of alkaloids was confirmed from ethanolic extract of Leea indica leaves
Alkaloids
Alkaloids were reported from hexane, acetone, chloroform, methanol and ethanolic extract of Leea guineensis leaves
Alkaloids
These alkaloids were identified from ethyl acetate, butanol and aqueous fraction of ethanolic extract of Leea macrophylla root tubers
Saponins
The presence of saponins was ascertained from aqueous extract of Leea guineensis leaves
Saponins
The presence of saponins was proved from hexane, acetone and ethanolic extract of Leea guineensis leaves
Saponins
The presence of saponins was confirmed in the aqueous fraction of ethanolic extract of Leea macrophylla root tubers
Saponins
These saponins were identified from ethanolic extract of Leea indica leaves
Saponins
The presence of saponins was showedin n-hexane and chloroform extract of Leea macrophylla seeds
di-n-butyl phthalate (35), Butyl-2-ethylhexyl phthalate (36), Isooctyl phthalate (37)
The presence of these oils identified from 1-butanol fraction of methanolic extract of Leea indica leaves
di-n-butylphthalate (35), di-isobutylphthalate (38), n-butylisobutylphthalate (39), Butylisohexylphthalate (40)
These essential oils were isolated from diethyl ether extract of Leea indica flowers
Reducing Sugars
These reducing sugars were identified from aqueous extract of Leea guineensis leaves
Sugars
These sugars were identified from ethanolic extract of Leea macrophylla root tubers
Reducing sugars
The presence of reducing sugar was confirmed from ethanolic extract of Leea macrophylla leaves
Proteins
The presence of proteins was confirmed from butanol and aqueous fraction of ethanolic extract of Leea macrophylla root tubers
Proteins
The presence of proteins was confirmed from ethyl acetate and methanol extract of Leea macrophylla seeds
Carbohydrates
The presence of these compounds was identified from ethanolic extract of Leea indica leaves
Carbohydrates
The presence of carbohydrates was confirmed from ethyl acetate and methanol extract of Leea macrophylla seeds
Phenylethyl-rutinoside (41), Icariside D1 (42), Hexenyl-rutinoside (43), Everlastoside C (44)
These diglycosidic compounds were identified from methanolic extract of aerial parts of Leea asiatica
Bergenin (45), Citroside A (46)
These compounds were identified from methanolic extract of aerial parts of Leea asiatica
(7S,8R)-9′-O-acetylcedrusin (47), (3S,4S)-4-chloro-3-hydroxypiperidin-2-one (48)
These compounds were isolated from the ethanolic extract of the aerial parts of Leea aequata

trans-N- p-coumaroyltyramine (49), N-trans-feruloyltyramine (50), Vanillic acid (51), Syringic acid (52),α-hydroxyacetovanillone (53), 3,4,5-trihydroxybenzoic acid ethyl ester (54), Isotachioside (55), (6S,9S)-roseoside C (56), Scopoletin (57), 5-hydroxymethylfurfural (58)
These compounds were isolated from the ethanolic extract of the aerial parts of Leea aequata
Amino Acids, Mucilage's
These compounds were identified from aqueous fraction of ethanolic extract of Leea macrophylla root tubers
